item.title: Kubernetes (k8s) for the Rest of Us
item.description: Seems everywhere you look there are guides on how to get started with Kubernetes

item.title: Deploying to Cloud with DigitalOcean + Docker
item.description: Containerization allows development teams to move fast, deploy software efficiently, and operate at an unprecedented scale. They are small They are fast They consume no more engergy than running an application They take up 100’s of times less space and memory than virtual machines Setup Optional Get a DO account https://m.do.co/c/e224d565e5ec - this link gives 100 USD credit. Install Docker - do before starting Docker Download - Mac
